newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Sabena in maintenance deal with Biman.
newsitem.headline: Sabena in maintenance deal with Biman.

text.p: Sabena Technics, a unit of Belgian flag carrier Sabena, will provide long-term maintenance for Biman Bangladesh Airline's Airbus A310-300 aircraft, Sabena said in a statement on Friday.
Sabena said it would station engineers at Dhaka airport, Bangladesh, to ensure line and light maintenance on site.
